text: José Sulaimán Chagnón (born May 30, 1931 - January 16, 2014) was a Mexican boxing official. He was the president of the World Boxing Council. He was entered into the International Boxing Hall of Fame on June 10, 2007.International Boxing Hall of Fame. El Universal Sulaimán was born in Ciudad Victoria, Tamaulipas. He died in Los Angeles, California. ==References== ==Other websites== *Q & A Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Mexican businesspeople Category:Chief executives Category:People from Tamaulipas
title: José Sulaimán
